lines.text: I'm flattered that you like my ass.
I'd rather imagine a man than know him for sure.
Lucy, it's interesting how you always wear black and deny yourself food.
God! Why are you always everywhere with something to say?!
I'm thankful that woman is here. She's a pill but highly effective.
Here's my kiss and you can fax me your hug.
You just have to follow your intuition.
My intuition is fine, it's yours I'm worried about!
We are who we are, irrespective of the company we keep.
Which is why ever since some painter screamed for his idiot dog with a stupid name we've been unable to utter one intelligent word.
